scripts.test: npm run quick-build && npm run tape
scripts.full-test: npm run small-build && npm run build-tests && npm run use-minified && npm run tape && node --expose-gc test/perf/index.js && npm run test-flow && node test/mixed-versions/mixed-versions.js && npm run test-webpack
scripts.perf: npm run small-build && PERSIST=true time node --expose-gc test/perf/index.js
scripts.test-browser-electron: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js | tape-run | faucet )
scripts.test-browser-chrome: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome | faucet )
scripts.test-browser-safari: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | tape-run --browser safari | faucet )
scripts.test-browser-firefox: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js  | tape-run --browser firefox | faucet )
scripts.test-travis: npm run full-test && npm run quick-build && istanbul cover tape test/*.js test/typescript/typescript-tests.js && npm run size
scripts.coverage: npm run quick-build && npm run build-tests && istanbul cover tape test/*.js test/typescript/typescript-tests.js
scripts.build-tests: npm run build-typescript-tests && npm run build-babel-tests
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts src/types/*.ts src/api/*.ts src/core/*.ts src/utils/*.ts
